data.job_desc: Work as a Fullstack Developer Build backend and frontend from start.

detail.desc: Designed and contributed to the UI/UX of websites using Figma to create a user-friendly and visually appealing interface.
Contribute develop website using Next.js and TypeScript, integrating MongoDB and MySQL for data management, and styled the application with Material UI.
Implemented Test-Driven Development practices using Jest to ensure code reliability and maintainability.
Built and integrated JWT-based authentication for both frontend and backend, securely storing tokens in the database.
